name: The Hive (itch) (harderer)
description:
My game prototype for Brackeys Game Game 2021.

Stronger Together

One Bee is not enough to let the hive live. Many bees are required to collect pollen, produce honey and let the hive survive.

Control your bees to find pollen rich flowers. Do the flower dance to show other bees the way to them and let the hive produce honey, which is required to keep your bees strengths and spawn more bees. Be sure to collect pollen from many different flowers as they don't have infinite pollen and only slowly produce new ones. Increase your swarm and let the hive live. 

Controls:

W, A, S, D, Arrows: Move

Mouse: Rotate

E, Enter: Collect Pollen from a nearby blossom, Pass Pollen to the hive, use honey to increase your bees power, dance to show nearby bees the way to a flower

Tab: Switch active bee

Space, Shift: rise or lower
